txt.en:
'Besides slaying the Wargs, perhaps there is another way to make their Warg-breeding ineffective. Every camp has a leader, and these Wargs have many handlers.

'If you would, go to Maudhul-ulur and defeat any goblin-keepers you find. Perhaps by defeating the handlers, the Wargs will be thrown into disarray.

'When you have slain the goblin-keepers, return to me.'
'You have done well to defeat so many of the goblins, but I fear it is still not enough. This beast has many hands, but only one head....'
'Please...you must defeat the Warg-handlers of Maudhul-ulur, or they will continue to threaten Echad Sirion.'
You were unable to defeat all of the Wargs, but Goldínwen has another plan.
Goblin Warg-keepers can be found at Maudhul-ulur, south from Echad Glamodúd.\n\nGoldínwen has asked you to defeat the goblin Warg-keepers in order to throw the kennel into disarray.
Talk to Goldínwen at Echad Glamodúd
Goldínwen is at Echad Glamodúd, north from Maudhul-ulur.\n\nYou should return to Goldínwen and report your success.
